text: Hell Creek State Park is a public recreation area on the south side of Fort Peck Lake located due north of the community of Jordan, Montana. The state park's sit on the western side of Hell Creek Bay and include a year-round marina, facilities for water sports, camping, and fishing for walleye, northern pike, smallmouth bass, and spring lake trout. ==References== ==External links== *Hell Creek State Park Montana Fish, Wildlife & Parks Category:State parks of Montana Category:Protected areas of Garfield County, Montana Category:Protected areas established in 1966
title: Hell Creek State Park
